thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: ROBERT

author: ROBERT
title: ROBERT
text: I purchased the Buffalo sauced ribs; pork sausage in tubes, and steakburgers. I've had some of the ribs and sausage but haven't tried the steakburgers yet. The rib meat is of good quality and I like the peppery sauce; however, the meat is smoked and renders it like all smoked meat whether chicken, turkey or what have you. So, with these pork ribs I didn't get that finger lickin' good taste I do with others, just pretty good meat. The sausage requires cutting the plastic tube each time to slice but it has a good peppery taste and cooks up well.
